pageContent:
HARISH KUMAR 
Phone: +1 (470) 737-3398 
Email: hariishpk@gmail.com 
 
 
TECHNICAL SUMMARY 
 
• Around 7 years of experience in designing and developing high-end enterprise level 
native iOS Application. 
• Extensive working knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) - requirement 
gathering, designing, implementation, debugging and software maintenance. 
• Experience in coordinating Scrum meetings and  leading Daily Standups to track progress 
and facilitate timely deliverables. 
• Worked on Agile development methodology and produced high-quality deliverables on 
subsequent iterations. 
• Good grip over Object Oriented Concepts and good development experience towards building 
reusable code. 
• Strong working knowledge of Swift, Objective C and XCode SDK. 
• Experience working with Table Views, Collection Views, Stacks and Navigation Bars and 
customizing the views to provide a rich and intuitive user experience.

• Experience working with Table Views, Collection Views, Stacks and Navigation Bars and 
customizing the views to provide a rich and intuitive user experience. 
• Proficient in implementing UI designs using Storyboards, XIB files and programmatic UI. 
• Good working knowledge of native iOS frameworks such as: UIKit, Foundation, WebKit, 
PDFKit, WatchKit, LocalAuthentication, UserNotifications, XCTest. 
• Profound understanding of MVC and MVVM architecture patterns. 
• Extensive experience on working with design patterns like Delegation, Observer, Decorator, 
Singleton. 
• Proficient in integrating native third-party frameworks within the app for supporting app 
monitoring capabilities and user-preferred functionalities. 
• Experience integrating multiple RESTful API services along with XML and JSON data parsing. 
• Worked on GCD to support multitasking by running tasks asynchronously and to improve the 
application performance.

• Worked on GCD to support multitasking by running tasks asynchronously and to improve the 
application performance. 
• Utilized Keychains and NSUserDefaults for persistent data storage and retrieval. 
• Experience working with Universal App Links by utilizing the Branch IO SDK. 
• Good Understanding of Swift UI development concepts. 
• Extensively worked with UIACCESSIBILTY for supporting VoiceOver, to make the app 
accessible to users with visual impairments. 
• Experience working with remote notifications using Apple Push Notification Services. 
• Hands-on experience in generating working iOS builds to deliver for system integration 
testing. 
• Familiar with creating certificates, provisioning profiles and submitting the app to the App 
Store. 
• Solid experience in carrying out functional Unit Tests using the XCTest framework. 
• Proficient in source control with Git – merging branches, updating repository, checking out 
the code, rollback commits to undo changes.

• Proficient in source control with Git – merging branches, updating repository, checking out 
the code, rollback commits to undo changes. 
• Experience in diagnosing and fixing memory issues and fine-tuning the application using 
XCode Instruments. 
• Coordinated and worked closely with the offshore development team to ensure proper 
communication and to facilitate timely delivery of the features.

EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND: 
• Master’s degree in management information systems (Graduated on 2017) 
University of Akron, Akron, Ohio 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science (Graduated on 2014) 
Karunya University, Tamil Nadu, India. 
 
Certifications: 
• AWS Certified Developer (2017) 
• Oracle Certified Database Administrator 10g (2012) 
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
Client: Blue Shield of California  Feb 2024 – Till Date 
Implementation Partner: Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. 
Role: iOS Developer 
Environment: XCode, Swift5 
Location: Irving, TX 
 
Appstore URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/blue-shield-of-california/id728293729 
 
Description: The  Blue  Shield  of California  app  helps  customers  manage  their  health  care  from 
anywhere.  Customers  can  view  their  ID  card,  search  for  doctors,  track  the  claim  information, 
understand  their  benefits,  and  more.  The  Blue  Shield  of  California  app  provides  BSC  members

understand  their  benefits,  and  more.  The  Blue  Shield  of  California  app  provides  BSC  members 
enhanced 24/7 service and ease-of-access to the information that matters most. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Worked closely with the clients for gathering the user requirements to determine the design 
and the application flow. 
• Conducted daily scrum calls, sprint planning and reviews to track the status of project 
deliverables. 
• Collaborated with the team to define, design and develop new features. 
• Ensured the quality, performance and responsiveness of the application. 
• Identified and corrected bottle necks and fixed defects. 
• Established communication with back-end service systems by utilizing URLSession APIs. 
• Decoded API Json response to native swift objects using Codable protocol. 
• Adobe Mobile integration using iOS SDK for supporting app analytics, to understand the user's 
usage pattern.

• Decoded API Json response to native swift objects using Codable protocol. 
• Adobe Mobile integration using iOS SDK for supporting app analytics, to understand the user's 
usage pattern. 
• Worked with Universal App Links to launch and redirect the applications based on QR code 
scanning and link taps. 
• Upgraded the code base to enhance the capabilities of the app to support iOS 14 features and 
above. 
• Worked with Distribution and Development Certificates and Provisioning profiles for 
debugging and manual build generation. 
• Worked on NIB files for the UI design and facilitated smooth view transitioning. 
• Worked with UIWebViewDelegate protocol to initiate call backs to the UIWebView 
delegate methods. 
• Utilized Test Flight to facilitate in-house build distribution for testing and validation.

• Maintained and monitored the app to ensure application stability. 
 
 
 
Client: Andersen Corporation                                           June 2022 – Jan 2024  
Implementation Partner: Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. 
Role:  iOS Developer 
Environment: XCode, Swift5 
Location: Atlanta, GA 
 
Description: The Renewal by Andersen rSuite 2.5 is an inhouse application predominantly used by the 
store  employees.  It  supports  product  configuration,  sales  and  installation.  It  enables  user  to  select, 
customize and calculate the price of doors and windows. It displays the order’s cost and enables the user 
to apply savings and choose among the available finance plans. Egreement generates and displays all of 
the paperwork to be signed by the customer for the sale to be official. Techmapp allows the Measure Techs 
to  take  notes  on  installation  process,  record  their  measurements,  and  make  price  adjustments  which

to  take  notes  on  installation  process,  record  their  measurements,  and  make  price  adjustments  which 
generate more paperwork for the buyer to sign if necessary.  
Responsibilities: 
• Implemented the AGILE development process, worked with the SCRUM methodology to 
ensure the delivery of high-quality work in every iteration. 
• Monitored sprint progress, identified any impediments, and reported project updates to 
stakeholders effectively. 
• Developing a skeletal structure for the code to ensure code separation, readability and 
reusability. 
• Utilized NSJSONSerialization for parsing JSON data from the database, information storing 
and retrieval. 
• Working on Apple Push Notification Service to enable Remote Notifications from Provider to 
user’s device. 
• Utilized tools for monitoring CPU load, heap size and memory usage. 
• Created branches in Git to enable the developers to perform push, pull and commit operations.

user’s device. 
• Utilized tools for monitoring CPU load, heap size and memory usage. 
• Created branches in Git to enable the developers to perform push, pull and commit operations. 
• Worked  with  UIDocumentInteractionController for  presenting  financial  documents  in  pdf 
document format and employed UIPickerview for presenting the user selection options in a 
native iOS fashion (spinning-wheel format). 
• Performed  biometric  authentications  within  the  application  using  keychain  and  LAContext 
APIs. 
• Integrated the RSASDK into the project to fetch device information and capabilities. 
• Supported widget view for the application using Today Extension to display real time account 
information. 
• Enabled 3D Touch support for the application by working on UIApplicationShortcutItem. 
• Worked with MiSnap SDK for supporting manual and automatic check image capture to 
enable the check deposit. 
• Worked on the voice over feature for achieving the desired readout style.

• Worked with MiSnap SDK for supporting manual and automatic check image capture to 
enable the check deposit. 
• Worked on the voice over feature for achieving the desired readout style. 
• Implemented Multi View Applications designs, Customizing Table Views, Alert Views, 
Navigation bars, and Tab bars.

Client: M&T Bank    Feb 2020 – June 2022 
Implementation Partner: Cognizant Technology Solutions U.S. 
Role: iOS Developer  
Environment: Xcode, Swift4 
Location: Atlanta, GA 
 
 
Appstore URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/m-t-mobile-banking/id397761931 
 
 
Description: Bank quickly and get back to what matters most to you – that’s the idea behind the M&T 
Mobile Banking App built for both personal and business customers. Access retail and business account 
conveniently, bank securely, activate dormant accounts, move money swiftly, manage your card easily, 
reach the customer support readily. 
 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Actively involved in all phases of Software Development life cycle. 
• Standardized and refactored the code base to improve code structure and readability. 
• Upgraded the framework and libraries to keep the functionality secure and updated. 
• Replaced deprecated code with latest recommended API to resolve warning and crashes.

• Upgraded the framework and libraries to keep the functionality secure and updated. 
• Replaced deprecated code with latest recommended API to resolve warning and crashes. 
• Improved application performance by implementing concurrency and threading. 
• Resolved UI auto layout constraint issues and implemented Stack views – horizontal and 
vertical stacks. 
• Researched and built POC prototypes to leverage the new framework and features released by 
Apple. 
• Involved in providing production support during and after the app release process. 
• Upgraded Xcode, Swift versions and updated deployment target to facilitate the application 
compatibility with latest iOS versions. 
• Prepared Usecase charts, flowcharts and diagrams to capture the functionality and illustrate 
the sequence of steps, program must follow and to describe the operations involved. 
• Worked on high priority production incidents, debugged the root cause of the bug and 
provided optimal fix.

the sequence of steps, program must follow and to describe the operations involved. 
• Worked on high priority production incidents, debugged the root cause of the bug and 
provided optimal fix. 
• Coordinated and work with cross-functional digital teams and third-party vendors to fix 
critical incidents.

Client: SunTrust Banks, INC., Atlanta, GA    Feb 2018 – Feb 2020 
Implementation Partner: BPMLinks , LLC 
Role: iOS Developer  
Environment: XCode, Swift3 
Location: Atlanta, GA 
Appstore URL: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/suntrust-mobile-app/id458680449 
Description: The SunTrust Mobile App is optimized for the Apple device and is specifically designed to 
provide quick and secure access to the user personal accounts. User can make payments, transfers and 
mobile deposits, view account balances and account activity, send money via Zelle, manage their profile 
settings like update phone number, address and access all their bank related documents in one location, 
the Document Center. 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Involved in the design and development of the user interface and the functionality logic. 
• Involved in discussions with development to discuss about best practices and optimal 
approaches. 
• Developed the App using Cocoa Touch frameworks on UIKit.

• Involved in discussions with development to discuss about best practices and optimal 
approaches. 
• Developed the App using Cocoa Touch frameworks on UIKit. 
• Worked towards transforming wire frames into iOS prototypes.  
• Implemented constraints to ensure graceful orientation of the UI view elements. 
• Worked on UI related bug fixes. 
• Worked on accessibility related bug fixes. 
• Involved in contributing to loosely coupled code to be able to add changes as per requirement. 
• Performance test and fixes were done through instruments. 
• Collaborated with end users and clients during software implementation.
